content:
I have been a die hard fan of Overwatch since release, I'm a collector of all things overwatch, avid reader of lore and just love all the characters in this game. But if you are a new player and are thinking of getting into this game...I would suggest you look elsewhere, the game doesn't allow for you to have any fun, it is constantly in competitive mode even in quick play. You aren't even allowed to leave casual quickplay games without the game putting you into a temporary ban. When the stars align and everything goes right,this game feels euphoric and addicting, but that is few an far between and the times in between make you feel so low you just don't know what to do with yourself.

TL:DR 
If you want to feel like an addict, trying to get that next high, with awful times in between, Overwatch might just be your game.
OverWatch 1 was fun, Greed ruins everything
Every patch is terrible, why is Doom getting nerfed again while Orisa is getting yet again another set of micro buffs? and why is Bap getting buffs and Widow not getting a single change?
This game is like getting Ebola.

They took offline a cool hero shooter (Overwatch 1) to force people to play this F2P version of it that does not deserve the 2 in its name. If anything, it is Overwatch 0.5.
The promised story mode was lackluster and nothing like any story of a story game.
Also: being required to pay €10 for changing your nickname a second time. Peak capitalism.
While the game is F2P which enables tons of hackers to flush the game, you are still enabled to buy a skin pack containing four skins, one banner, and five player icons for €56 or a single weapon skin for €40

Stay clear from this scummy, greedy company & game.

I still play this game but the game is full of issues from poor balancing, both in the sense of skill based matchmaking and in hero balancing, as well as a terrible ranked system. (no reason you should have to win 5 games to rank up or down. Just make it so you see what it does every game.) 

Hopefully they start turning it around soon.

So many cheats and bots these days in most FPS, so I play the AI only, with "supposed" teammates on the easiest level.   I don't play for points, leveling, cool locks, but I do purchase things just to fund the company.   I play to get my head out of the F'ed up world we live in.   While playing, we are doing great and just about to win then all of a sudden, AI becomes unstoppable.  We spend the next 5 minutes dying over and over.  My Gift to Blizzard - UNINSTALLED!
